subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams beat Belinda Bencic of Switzerland, 6-2, 6-1, to open her defense of the Madrid Open title, while Maria Sharapova beat Klara Koukalova, 6-1, 6-2, in the first round.
snippet: Serena Williams beat Belinda Bencic of Switzerland, 6-2, 6-1, to open her defense of the Madrid Open title, while Maria Sharapova beat Klara Koukalova, 6-1, 6-2, in the first round.
